alldb.table_sql: select c.id, b1.fileid, b1.filename filename, b1.createdate, b1.realname, c.contract_number contractnumber, c.contract_name contractname, c.contract_type contracttype, t.name_ contracttypename, c.contract_subject contractsubject, c.mark, c.signing_time signingtime, c.contracting_place contractingplace, c.contract_person contractperson, t1.realname_ contractpersonname, c.contract_money contractmoney from CONTRACT_NUMBER_SETTING c left join (select b.file_key filekey, wm_concat(b.file_name) filename, wm_concat(b.create_date) createdate, wm_concat(t6.realname_) realname, wm_concat(b.id) fileid from base_file b left join t_users t6 on t6.id_ = b.creator_ where b.invalid_='æ˜¯' and b.file_key is not null group by b.file_key) b1 on b1.filekey=c.id left join t_dicts_datas t on t.id_=c.contract_type left join t_users t1 on t1.id_=c.contract_person where c.contract_id = '{contract_id}' order by c.create_date desc
